name: Blueberry Cobbler from Land O'Lakes
author: Anonymous
summary: Use fresh or frozen blueberries to create this sweet berry cobbler.
ingredients: ½ cup freshly squeezed orange juice
2 tablespoons cold LAND O LAKES® Butter, cut into small pieces
directions: Spray 8-inch square baking dish with no-stick cooking spray
Place blueberries, water, orange juice and 1 teaspoon orange zest into 3-quart saucepan
Combine 3/4 cup sugar and corn starch in bowl; stir into blueberry mixture
Cook over medium heat until bubbles begin to form; continue cooking 3-5 minutes or until juices are thickened
Combine flour, baking powder and salt in bowl
Cut in butter, using pastry blender or two forks, until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Add all remaining batter ingredients; stir until well mixed
Pour hot blueberry mixture into prepared baking dish
Dollop tablespoons of batter over hot filling
Sprinkle with sanding sugar, if desired
Bake 25-30 minutes or until light golden brown or toothpick inserted in center comes out clean
